name: bunkerm
description: BunkerM is a self-hosted dashboard for managing and monitoring Docker containers or apps. It features resource stats, controls for containers, and a clean web UI designed for local servers or NAS setups.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Monitor and control Docker containers easily. Visual container control

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Track CPU, memory, and network usage. Performance insights

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Start, stop, and restart containers from web UI. Simple management

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: User-friendly dashboard for server management. Intuitive design

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own container management dashboard. Complete control
